short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension update a persistent cookie used to authenticate on SplatNet 2 and SplatNet 3 websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allow users to authenticate on SplatNet website with browser.

To get your token follow instruction from splatnet2statink's project.
